description:
How would you like to ship packages for free, and get paid for it?

Whether just a couple time a month, or making a full-time commitment, mystery shopping is fun and rewarding.

You will need a computer, have access to an online payment system like paypal, and a good memory. This 60 minute class will prepare you to take shops in your neighborhood, and when you travel.

In fact the money you make on your first shop can pay for this video! It's like taking this class for free.

Mystery shopping is great for people with spare time like college students and retirees. We will provide a list of reputable secret shopping firms that have paid us for successful secret shops.
title: Guide to Becoming a Successful Secret Shopper
